entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (camp_epsilon_leader.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_14: I have something you need bad.
entries.s_15: Perfume?? Hey now! Just because you brought me this present doesn't mean....you and I...you know.  Well...thanks anyway, I do need it.
entries.s_31: You probably want HX-138, I'm just a technicial in borrowed armor.
entries.s_32: Actually I have a radio for you.
entries.s_33: A radio? I think I am qualified to use it...is there someone listening for communications?
entries.s_64: Well, I'm a tech...not really a combatant. All I had was a torn up pair of coveralls. The other guys started to collect armor pieces for me. Judging from the smell, the armor probably came from the undead.
entries.s_75: The radio is to coordinate supply drops.
entries.s_76: Wow...I can finally be of use around here. Thank you...thanks a lot!
